Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.filters

This package is for classes implementing filters within Global Search.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CategorySearchFilterItem A SearchFilterItem for Categories.
DateRangeSearchFilterItem A SearchFilterItem for a Date Range.
FacetSearchFilterItem A SearchFilterItem for Facet nodes.
KeywordSearchFilterItem A SearchFilterItem for Keywords.
SearchableObjectSearchFilterItem A SearchFilterItem for Facet Item nodes.
SearchFilterItem An abstract class representing a filter item.
SearchFilterItems A container of Root level SearchFilterItems.
SimpleFilterItemTileAdapter A class that adapts SearchFilterItems, which is a data-oriented collection of SearchFilterItems (which are also TileParts).
SingleSelectionSearchFilterItem An abstract implementation of SearchFilterItem foe single selection Facets, primarily to offload some of the work involved interacting with the LOV.
TagSearchFilterItem A SearchFilterItem for a Tag.
 

Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui.filters Description

This package is for classes implementing filters within Global Search. A filter is essentially the primary key of the search.
